post:
NODEWEB offer customers the highest quality experience at the cheapest rates. We aim at minimum profitability in every product.

Our servers can up to 1.9Gb/s Read&Write speed.

Use  _LET-LET-1_ code at order step to get **10% Lifetime Discount.**

**LINVPS #1**

- 1 vCPU
- 1 GB DDR4 RAM
- 25 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 Gbps / 200 Mbps
- Unlimited Bandwidth*
- Dedicated IPv4
- Europe / USA
Order: https://nodeweb.net/order-steps/server/151

    **2.90$** / monthly

**LINVPS #2**

- 2 vCPU
- 2 GB DDR4 RAM
- 25 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 Gbps / 500 Mbps
- Unlimited Bandwidth*
- Dedicated IPv4
- Europe / USA
Order: https://nodeweb.net/order-steps/server/152

`* Assigned network quota is 50 TB, you can increase this limit without any costs.`

**Available OS Templates:** Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, CentOS7, Debian 9

**Payment Methods:** PayPal, Credit/Debit Card, Bitcoin, Ethereum
